name: Savoury Granola
description: Satisfying, crunchy and jam-packed with healthy, wholesome ingredients. Add this to yogurts, smoothie bowls, salads, grainy sides, and nourish bowls.

ingredients.name: Everything Bagel Whole Food Topper, Poke Bowl Topper Blend, or Garlic & Onion Nutritional Yeast Topper

preparation: In a large mixing bowl, toss all ingredients together.
Pour mixture onto a Sheet Pan Liner lined Sheet Pan and bake until golden, approximately 25–30 minutes. Let cool. Store in an airtight container for up to 7 days.
